description: High-confidence expected unmatched categories for adjusted match rate calculation

categories.name: Accounting Placeholders & Data Quality Issues
categories.reason: Not real vendors but accounting entries and wire business units for bulk transfers

categories.name: Internal Treasury Transfers
vendor_patterns: Commonwealth of Va Dept of the Treasury
categories.reason: Inter-agency transfers and payment operations not tied to specific DPB programs

categories.name: Health Insurance Premium Payments
category_expense_patterns: PERSONAL SERVICES / Employer Health Ins Premium
categories.reason: Individual health insurance premiums and claims may not map cleanly to DPB program structure

categories.name: Local Government Pass-Through Payments
category_expense_patterns: TRANSFER PAYMENTS / Cat Aid-Local Govts&Const Off
TRANSFER PAYMENTS / Payments To Substate Entities
categories.reason: Categorical aid to localities distributed across multiple DPB programs

categories.name: Payments to Individuals
categories.reason: Direct payments to individuals often distributed across multiple programs or not tied to specific appropriations

categories.name: Highway Construction (VDOT)
categories.reason: VDOT has unique program structure requiring agency-specific matching rules

categories.name: Alcoholic Beverage Inventory
categories.reason: ABC operates as enterprise fund; inventory purchases may not map to appropriations

categories.name: University Medical Centers
categories.reason: Academic medical centers have complex funding mix of state appropriations, patient revenue, and grants

categories.name: Bond and Debt Service
categories.reason: Debt service payments are financial obligations not tied to operational DPB programs
